Package edu.bu.labs.rttt.game

Class TicTacToeGame.TicTacToeGameView

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.labs.rttt.game.TicTacToeGame.TicTacToeGameView
Enclosing class:
TicTacToeGame
public static class TicTacToeGame.TicTacToeGameView extends Object
A class that represents a read-only immutable data structure containing the state of an individual tic tac toe game (also referred to as an "inner" game by RecursiveTicTacToeGame).
See Also:
  • Coordinate
  • CellType
  • PlayerType

    • getNumRemainingCoords

      public final int getNumRemainingCoords()
      A getter method to get the number of empty squares remaining on this "inner" game.
      Returns:
      The number of moves made in the game so far.

    • getIsGameOver

      public final boolean getIsGameOver()
      A getter method to get if this "inner" game has an outcome. The reason this value is cached instead of recalculated every time is because once a player wins this game the remaining empty squares can still be played. If we were to recalculate this every time we want to know if this game is over, we might accidentally credit the win to a player who scored a tic tac toe *after* the game was intially won.
      Returns:
      true if this "inner" game has an outcome and false otherwise.

    • getOutcome

      public final PlayerType getOutcome()
      A getter method to get the outcome of this game. This will return null if this game was a tie and a PlayerType corresponding to the winning player otherwise. This value is cached and not recalculated for the same reasoning as the getIsGameOver method.
      Returns:
      The cached outcome of this game. Returns a PlayerType if someone won and null otherwise.

    • getCellType

      public final CellType getCellType(int rIdx, int cIdx)
      A getter method to get the contents of a square specified by row/col indices. The contents of a cell will be a CellType value.
      Parameters:
      rIdx - The row (y coordinate) index of the "inner" game to lookup the outcome of.
      cIdx - The col (x coordinate) index of the "inner" game to lookup the outcome of.
      Returns:
      The contents of a square specified by row/col indices.

    • getCellType

      public final CellType getCellType(Coordinate c)
      A getter method to get the contents of a square specified by a Coordinate. The contents of a cell will be a CellType value.
      Parameters:
      c - The Coordinate of the square in this game to get the contents of.
      Returns:
      The contents of a square specified by row/col indices.

    • isInBounds

      public boolean isInBounds(Coordinate c)
      A method to determine if the provided Coordinate is in-bounds (e.g. the location is valid). The x coordinate corresponds to a column index and the y coordinate corresponds to a row index.
      Parameters:
      c - The Coordinate to test if it is in bounds or not.
      Returns:
      true if the Coordinate's x coordinate is within [0, num_cols) and its y coordinate is within [0, num_rows) and false otherwise.

    • isLegalMove

      public boolean isLegalMove(Coordinate c)
      A method to determine if the square specified by the provided Coordinate is available. A square is available if it is not occupied and if it is not marked as unavailable (see CellType).
      Parameters:
      c - The location of the square in this game
      Returns:
      true if that square is available and false otherwise.

    • didPlayerWin

      public boolean didPlayerWin(PlayerType type)
      A method to determine if the specified PlayerType has won this game.
      Parameters:
      type - The PlayerType to check if that player won or not.
      Returns:
      true if the specified player has won this game of tic tac toe and false otherwise.

    • getAvailableMoves

      public Set<Coordinate> getAvailableMoves()
      A method to get all available Coordinates that the current player could choose on this game.
      Returns:
      The set of Coordinates the current player can make on this game.

    • applyMove

      public TicTacToeGame.TicTacToeGameView applyMove(Coordinate c, PlayerType t)
      A method to apply the provided move (e.g. the Coordinate the by the provided player.
      Parameters:
      c - The Coordinate of the square the current player wants to mark.
      t - The PlayerType of the player making the move.
      Returns:
      A TicTacToeGame.TicTacToeGameView where the move has been made and game logic advanced one turn.
